DOC.brief_summary: Prospective observational study evaluate effect wash improve viability fat graft breast lipofilling .
DOC.brief_title: Volumetric Study Fat Resorption After Breast Lipofilling
DOC.criteria: Patients breast defect post breast surgery unsatisfied . The first lipofilling procedure delay least 9 month completion radiotherapy . Patient chemotherapy defer least 6 month last chemotherapy . Patients exclude experienced local recurrence distant metastasis
